title: Welcome to my personal website
text:
Hi!

My name is Shivank Goel. I am an undergraduate candidate at the University of Toronto, Ontario pursuing my Bachelor’s in Mathematics and Statistics major and Computer Sciences minor.

title: Contact
text:
Contact Me

title: About
text: My name is Shivank Goel. I am an undergraduate candidate at the University of Toronto, Ontario pursuing my Bachelor’s in Mathematics and Statistics major and Computer Sciences minor. I am interested in teaching mathematics and mathematical educational research. I believe that everyone can learn mathematics and logic plays an important role in learning and teaching mathematics.
